message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I think a 60/40 split is fair considering the inflation working against us.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine. Let's agree on this and finish this quickly.
Bob, let's be reasonable. You're losing value faster than I am. I'm offering you 45, which is already more than you'd get if you wait any longer.
